item.title: Configure GitHub on Termux
item.description: Install Termux Install termux via the f-droid store, the Google Play store has a version of Termux too, but that one is outdated, use f-droid or the github repository releases to install the latest version. Install Git and openssh Run the following command to update and upgrade all existing software: apt update && apt upgrade Install git and openssh apt install git openssh Give Termux access to the local storage You’ll probably want Termux to have access to the storage of your android device, in order to do that simply use the following command:
